arStrings.szText: Malignant {c_highlight}Invokers{/c} are keys used to summon powerful Malignant enemies from {c_highlight}masses{/c} at the end of {c_highlight}Malignant Tunnels{/c}.
Malignant {c_highlight}Invokers{/c} are keys used to summon powerful Malignant enemies from {c_highlight}masses{/c} at the end of {c_highlight}Malignant Tunnels{/c}.
{c_highlight}Invokers{/c} are used automatically when interacting with a {c_highlight}mass{/c}. The type of mass and invoker {c_highlight}must match{/c}, and so will the Heart the enemy can drop.
{c_highlight}Invokers{/c} are used automatically when interacting with a {c_highlight}mass{/c}. The type of mass and invoker {c_highlight}must match{/c}, and so will the Heart the enemy can drop.

Powerful enemies summoned from {c_highlight}invokers{/c} drop more {c_highlight}powerful Malignant hearts{/c}. The rarest {c_highlight}invokers{/c} will guarantee {c_highlight}Wrathful enemies{/c}, with Wrathful hearts.
Powerful enemies summoned from invokers drop more {c_highlight}powerful Malignant hearts{/c}. The rarest invokers will guarantee {c_highlight}Wrathful enemies{/c}, with Wrathful hearts.
